attributes.action: Allow egg donors to be paid reasonable expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Egg donors can only claim £50 per day in lost earnings. If you earn more than minimum wage you are not only donating eggs but paying for the privilage to donate. We are not asking for thousands just real cost expenses. Egg donors are vital to some couples who need these donations to create a much wanted family. Currently couples who can afford it must go 
abroad due to the shortage of donors. If couples can not afford egg share prices or forign eggs then they remain childless.
